nodes.text: Morn Meebler was a field producer for the HoloNet program Wild, Wild Galaxy. Meebler worked for the HoloNet Broadcasting Service on Coruscant. After the Battle of Yavin, Morn Meebler searched for a group of seasoned hunters for the show's next season. The hunters had to defend settlements from vicious migrating creatures, filmed by Meebler's remote-controlled hovercams.
